BuffData.DynamicTooltip:
Bonetooth NecklaceRengar collects trophies when killing Champions and gains bonus effects based on how many trophies he has. Kills and assists grant 1 trophy.

3 Trophies: +@f1@ Movement Speed whilst out of combat or in brush.
6 Trophies: Leap range is increased by @f2@.
12 Trophies: Thrill of the Hunt's duration is increased by @f3@ seconds.
20 Trophies: Thrill of the Hunt's Movement Speed while stealthed is doubled.Source: @SourceName@
